thread.title: Germany says 3.6 mln VW cars will require hardware changes
thread.title_full: Germany says 3.6 mln VW cars will require hardware changes | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Germany says 3.6 mln VW cars will require hardware changes
text: BERLIN Oct 9 Roughly 3.6 million Volkswagen cars in Europe with 1.6-litre engines will require hardware changes in the wake of the company's diesel emissions rigging scandal, a spokesman for the German transport ministry said on Friday. (Reporting by Noah Barkin ; editing by David Stamp )
